amendment.description: Amendment allows witnesses who are not a party to a trial to request that his or her image and voice be obscured during the witness' testimony.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to give discretion to witnesses in televised federal court proceedings to have their photograhic image obscured and their recorded voice distorted while testifying in District Courts.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Nadler amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.
